view.animations.unit

Interface AnimationView

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    EntityAnimationView, HeroView, SingleAnimationView
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAnimationView, AbstractEnemyView, AbstractEntityView, AbstractSingleAnimationView, BallomView, BombView, ExplosionView, HeroViewImpl, MinvoView, PassView

    public interface AnimationView
    This interface manages the visual representation of a frame-based animation. These methods are needed for each type of animation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.awt.Image getImage()
      Gets the frame associated to the current state of the animation.
      LevelElement getLevelElement() 
      int getX() 
      int getY() 
      void updateFrame()
      Updates the frame for the current animation.

    • Method Detail

      • getImage

        java.awt.Image getImage()
        Gets the frame associated to the current state of the animation.
        Returns:
        the frame to display, properly sized

      • getX

        int getX()
        Returns:
        the x coordinate of the frame.

      • getY

        int getY()
        Returns:
        the y coordinate of the frame.

      • updateFrame

        void updateFrame()
        Updates the frame for the current animation.

      • getLevelElement

        LevelElement getLevelElement()
        Returns:
        the represented element.
